text: Shaari Alla Shaarada is a 1982 Indian Malayalam film directed by KG Rajasekharan. ==Cast== * Jose Prakash as Father * Adoor Bhavani as Francis's mother * MG Soman aa Venu * Seema as Shari/Sharada * Sudheer as Johny *Hari as David *Kaduvakulam Antony as Keshavan *Khadeeja as Mariyamma *KPAC Sunny as Francis *Nellikkode Bhaskaran as Shari's father *Thodupuzha Radhakrishnan *Manavalan Joseph as Villager *PR Menon as grooms father == Soundtrack == == Release =+ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Shaari Alla Shaarada
